definition.name: drv.publisher.placement.type
definition.description:
xlfid(NOVLEDIRDCFG.idmresource.NOVLEDIRDCFGSynchronizationPrompts.gcv.dscr.drv.publisher.placement.type)Select how objects are placed in the remote eDirectory and the local Identity Vault. Mirrored: Mirrors the structure between the remote eDirectory and the local Identity Vault.
Flat: All of the objects are placed in a single container.
Department: Users are placed in containers named after the department.

definition.name: drv.remote.dit.data.users
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLEDIRDCFG.idmresource.NOVLEDIRDCFGSynchronizationPrompts.gcv.dscr.drv.remote.dit.data.users)Specify the (base) container in your remote eDirectory where the users reside.

definition.name: drv.remote.dit.data.groups
definition.description: xlfid(NOVLEDIRDCFG.idmresource.NOVLEDIRDCFGSynchronizationPrompts.gcv.dscr.drv.remote.dit.data.groups)Specify the (base) container in your remote eDirectory where the users reside.
